title: Has technology helped in connecting people or insulating them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mentally connected and emotionally disturbed. Social media makes people more depressed because people are showing off too much. You can't trust everything you see. Not everyone is as happy as their Instagram story looks like. People are pretending more and more and it's getting suffocating. Deep down we all feel emotionally incomplete. Sad and depressed. But yeah, obviously technology helps a lot. It plays a huge role in each person's Life. In this high tech modern world it takes less than a second to drop a message, Woah! You can connect with people all over the world. It has own benefits. • Use it as much as you need not as much as you can. Excess of anything is bad. • Don't get attached with people (on social media) easily, everyone can talk sweetly!

The cellphone is the worst thing that could happen to society. Picture the family sitting in a restaurantand everyone is on their cell. It is at once a blessing and a curse. Attempt to start a conversation with some young individual, they haven’t a clue on how to communicate face to face and eye to eye.
Technology has isolated people for sure. Most of us never realize the real happenings of the world.whatever happens people participate virtually and not in reality..
